name: OUROBOROS (itch) (lmarchwiak)
description:
OUROBOROS is a classic Snake game remixed into a puzzle game.

Your goal is to eat your tail while avoiding any obstacle.

This game is an entry for a Black and White game jam #8 - Theme: Loop and contains eight easy levels - It should take you around 2-5 minutes to complete.

Whether you enjoyed or disliked your play, please leave your feedback (even the harsh one), so I can improve this and/or future games :)
